title: Prototype KAFA Management System
description: Developed and tested a prototype system for parents to enroll their primary school children for extracurricular KAFA activities for Majlis Agama, Negeri Pahang

title: Prototype Research Lab Management System
description: Developed and tested a prototype system to manage lab assets for Faculty of Computing, University Malaysia of Pahang Al-Sultan Abdullah

title: Prototype E-Munakahat System
description: Developed and tested a prototype of a web-based system for couples in Pahang to register a marriage license for Majlis Agama Islam, Negeri Pahang.
